about_the_game:
Welcome to Trishu-Drift, an open-world drifting game that redefines the genre with unique mechanics and exhilarating gameplay! Immerse yourself in the thrill of high-speed drifting, master the art of the touge, and explore a vast, dynamic world designed for drift enthusiasts.

Open World Exploration: Navigate through diverse environments, from bustling city streets to scenic mountain roads. Discover hidden spots and perfect your drifting skills across varied terrains.

Unique Drifting Mechanics: Earn nitrous boosts by executing perfect drifts, adding a strategic layer to your driving experience. Use nitrous to gain speed and outmanoeuvre rivals in high-stakes races.

Touge Challenges: Test your skills on challenging mountain passes inspired by the iconic Japanese touge. Experience intense downhill races that demand precision and control.

Multiplayer and PvP: Compete with friends and players worldwide in online PvP modes. Show off your drifting prowess and climb the leaderboards!

Customization and Tuning: Build your dream drift car with extensive customization options. Tune your vehicle's performance to suit your drifting style, from engine upgrades to suspension tweaks.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Trishu-Drift, an open-world drifting game that redefines the genre with unique mechanics and exhilarating gameplay! Immerse yourself in the thrill of high-speed drifting, master the art of the touge, and explore a vast, dynamic world designed for drift enthusiasts.

Open World Exploration: Navigate through diverse environments, from bustling city streets to scenic mountain roads. Discover hidden spots and perfect your drifting skills across varied terrains.

Unique Drifting Mechanics: Earn nitrous boosts by executing perfect drifts, adding a strategic layer to your driving experience. Use nitrous to gain speed and outmanoeuvre rivals in high-stakes races.

Touge Challenges: Test your skills on challenging mountain passes inspired by the iconic Japanese touge. Experience intense downhill races that demand precision and control.

Multiplayer and PvP: Compete with friends and players worldwide in online PvP modes. Show off your drifting prowess and climb the leaderboards!

Customization and Tuning: Build your dream drift car with extensive customization options. Tune your vehicle's performance to suit your drifting style, from engine upgrades to suspension tweaks.
name: Trishu-Drift

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I7
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti

short_description: Get ready for unprecedented immersive drifting, breathtaking sights, and high-speed thrills. Race through various landscapes, including gorgeous countryside and busy city streets. To earn awards and unlock new vehicles and tracks, compete in single-player, multiplayer, and special event races.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Bulgarian*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Danish*, Finnish*, Greek*, Japanese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Swedish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Thai*, Czech*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Azerbaijani*, Assamese*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bangla*, Bosnian*, Cherokee*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Irish*, Icelandic*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Catalan*, Quechua*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Kyrgyz*, Konkani*, Croatian*, K'iche'*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Malayalam*, Malay*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Macedonian*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Uyghur*, Urdu*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Yoruba*, Zulu*, Xhosa*
